00000002 ; patadr, pattern address 0
00000042 ; 0x21 << 1
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; patclk, 0, redundant
00000040 ; 0x20 << 1
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000002 ; BIAS ON
0000000C
00000001
00000001
00000004 ; patclk 1 tick out, 100NS
00000040 ; 0x20 << 1
00000001
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000006 ; Frequency 2440000000
00000004
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000072
0000006f
00000091
00000004 ; patclk 2 ticks out, 200NS
00000040 ; 0x20 << 1
00000002
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; power 60.0dBm
00000006
00000001
00000000
00000000
0000003C
00000004 ; patclk 3 ticks out, 300NS
00000040 ; 0x20 << 1
00000003
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000008 ; pulse with meas
0000000A ; 0x5 << 1
00000001
00000005 ; width, 500ns, 5 ticks
00000000 
00000000
00000001 ; meas flag
00000001 ; meas offset
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; patclk at 9 ticks for PTN_BRANCH at 8us 
00000040 ; 0x20 << 1
00000009
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000006 ; PTN_BRANCH at 8us
00000046
00000003
00000000
00000002 ; 2 pulses in loop
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; next, end pattern, patctl
00000044 ; 0x22 << 1 
00000010 ; PTN_END bit, d4
00000000
00000000 ; pattern ending address, not used
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
